# Invisibility, Swift (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Glamer Spells|glamer]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 125

*With a whispered syllable you complete the spell. You notice that others look past you as if you werenâ€™t there.*

This spell functions like *[[Invisibility (Spell)|invisibility]]*, except as noted above.
